              My name is Vinayak.
            </p>

            <p data-start="8.00" data-end="33.00">
              I am a methodologist, with a background in health behaviour change and an interest in making social science (particularly psychology and health psychology) more open.<br>

            </p>

            <p data-start="33.00" data-end="54.00">
              I’m calling this project “Varthai”, which is a word from the Tamil language.<br>
              It translates to “word” in English.<br>
              The name comes from the idea that the same object can often be expressed using different words.
            </p>

            <p data-start="54.00" data-end="76.00">
              So, in that vein, I’d like to use different words (in the metaphorical sense) to express my work.<br>
              Through data visualisations, drawings and poetry, I’d like to have a word with you.
            </p>

            <p data-start="76.00" data-end="90.00">
              Or to put it in Tamil:<br>
              <strong>தரவு காட்சிப்படுத்தல்கள், ஓவியங்கள், கவிதைகள் மூலமா, உங்களோட ஒரு வார்த்தை பேச ஆசை.</strong>
            </p>
          </div>
